title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4213.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4213.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth and codify the
application process, eligibility criteria and procedure for the administration
by the corporation of the Minority and Women Business Development and Revolving

Loan Fund Program authorized and to be funded from the appropriation made by
the appropriating legislation. The purpose of the program is to provide
financial assistance to minority and women business enterprises. The
corporation will also seek to establish affirmative action goals for
participation in program projects by minorities and women pursuant to the UDC
Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4213.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
